title: Triple Double Oreo Cookie Review: Oreo Oration
description:
Ever eat an Oreo and want another Oreo attached to that Oreo? See how the Triple Double Oreo stacks up in the Oreo Oration Review.

Nabisco went bonkers and made a Golden Oreo. Here's the review.

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Every Wednesday and Friday, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review. 

Leave your review of today's cookie as a video response.

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody welcome to Oreo aeration I'm Greg Miller and while you were out living your life buying tires for that minivan you love so much the fine people at Horry were making endless variations of milks favorite cookie so every Wednesday and Friday I tear open a new package and give you a tasty review without any calories if you like that like the video subscribe to my channel today we're reviewing hold on to your hats triple double Oreos that's right ladies and gentlemen you said I can't believe this show has been going this long how many Oreos can there be Oreo said we'll take the Oreos you love and shove them together into one crazy-ass Oreo so here you go triple doubles Oreo ation vets know every show begins with the first look here tear it open whoo doctor look at how good they look on there they're lined up there no broken cookies no split cookies let's get the bouquet the chocolate smell overwhelming on these bad boys all right yeah of course we got chocolate and

they look on there they're lined up there no broken cookies no split cookies let's get the bouquet the chocolate smell overwhelming on these bad boys all right yeah of course we got chocolate and vanilla creams mixed in with chocolate cookies getting a lot of chocolate now here's the thing how am I gonna pull one out and get just there you go Wow okay so there you go it is basically the Big Mac of Oreos if you know you're like I want a Double Stuf but I want a little bit more meat on the bones they're like well there you go that's how we're gonna do it we're gonna shove them together like this so of course second part of any Oreo ovation oration whatever the show's called okay whoa I don't know what I was expecting but it wasn't this I've gone down a dark hole again it's good the white cream completely lost in the mix I have no idea where it is the the chocolate cookie tastes overwhelming overpowering it's like I'm just eating like it's almost like with the chocolate cream and then

cream completely lost in the mix I have no idea where it is the the chocolate cookie tastes overwhelming overpowering it's like I'm just eating like it's almost like with the chocolate cream and then the 303 chocolate cookie cookie all it is is a cookie you might as well just be a sleeve of chocolate cookies like just you know the hubcaps here let me take another bite here a smaller one no good a lot of cookie dough if you're in the mood for a cookie why don't you just tear them up and tear off a normal cookie and then eat the cookie you know I mean you know third part milk pairing how do these bad boys go to with milk of course after dunkey gate here on oreo Horatian we learned how to dunk them yo 1 2 3 up now I'm expecting some good things out of this of course we've learned the chocolate cookie seem to hold milk better well yeah No Mas no mas the problem of course being that with chocolate cookies on the outside not getting soggy like you like him well then you got that middle

cookie seem to hold milk better well yeah No Mas no mas the problem of course being that with chocolate cookies on the outside not getting soggy like you like him well then you got that middle bastard and he's just like I'm gonna stick here and be a hard-ass I'm just gonna stick and be this normal cookie this is cookie in the conundrum you don't know what you're getting every bite everything's different now we're gonna do orientations third and fourth tests here the twist how do you how do I even want to twist this uh I'm gonna go both oh look at that we got that nice twist on that of course this why would i twist this cookies the next problem with this thing right if I wanted more usually you twist one cooking you're like now I'm gonna eat just the cookie hubcap I'm on my mom it's great you get that cookie taste but biting into this bad boy you get the cookie that's how it goes twist this one two there you go now if you wanted make a weird double stufs um abomination again this

you get that cookie taste but biting into this bad boy you get the cookie that's how it goes twist this one two there you go now if you wanted make a weird double stufs um abomination again this cookie is just breaking all the Oreo rules I don't know we're up against time for scoring I'm gonna explore the Oreo oration scale here and give it a seven I think it's a bit it's a mystifying cookie of what you know where am I going with this thing what am i doing it's it's dunks well on to three cookie sides I bite into it tastes just like the hubcap cookie 7.0 I'm not sure I feel about this guy I'm not sure what it means to me so that's how the cookie crumbles for the triple double Oreo but what do you think you might have had the triple double Oreo if so leave your video below your review as a video response then like the video subscribe to my channel really important are there other Oreos out there that I haven't tasted that I haven't reviewed on this show let me know in the comments then
